name: In Memoriam (1Zgames)
description:
Our second winning game and second Game Jam. This time we had fun in Poznańs theatre 36h Game Jam.

In memoriam is game we made at game jam in the theatre, poznan. Based on Adam Mickiewicz's poem ,,Dziady". You are a ghost of women, who must discover her  sins. Gameplay is poem wrote in our own.
